Components

Toolbars

Toolbar style: Icons

After clicking the search icon

Configuration

Each icon can also exist by itself, so if you only need for example the search and grid icon you can remove/comment out the code for the sort icon. See example below:

<div class="toolbar-icons">
	
	  <!-- Slide out search field -->
	  <div class="slide-out-search">
	    <input type="search" class="search-field" data-list-icons-search-field placeholder="Start typing to filter results..">
	  </div>
	
	  <!-- Icon list -->
	  <ul class="toolbar-icons__icons">
	    <li data-list-icons-search-action-target="[data-list-icons-search-field]" data-id="search-action" class="icons__tool">
	      <svg class="tool-icon">
	        <use xlink:href="../../images/sprite.svg#common--search"></use>
	      </svg>
	    </li>
	    <!-- Comment out a list item if it's not needed
	    <li data-id="sort-action" class="icons__tool">
	      <a href="#">
	        <svg class="tool-icon">
	          <use xlink:href="../../images/sprite.svg#common--arrows"></use>
	        </svg>
	      </a>
	    </li>
	    -->
	    <li class="icons__tool">
	      <a href="#">
	        <svg class="tool-icon">
	          <use xlink:href="../../images/sprite.svg#common--grid"></use>
	        </svg>
	      </a>
	    </li>
	  </ul>
	
	</div>

Testing the slide out search field

In order to test the slide out search field on the overview page of bluemix-components, make sure you uncomment the first line of the class toolbar-icons:

.toolbar-icons {
	  // Uncomment the line below to test the slide-out search field
	  // margin-left: 25em;
	  display: flex;
	}
	
<h1 id="toolbars">Toolbars</h1>
	<h2 id="toolbar-style-icons">Toolbar style: Icons</h2>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/2212/0000/9454/c85087bc-cbfe-11e5-9136-f7f17976210c.png" alt="Toolbar: Icons"></p>
	<h4 id="after-clicking-the-search-icon">After clicking the search icon</h4>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/2212/0000/9477/a8901c8c-cc10-11e5-9807-3eb5cb107cba.gif" alt="toolbar-search-2"></p>
	<h3 id="configuration">Configuration</h3>
	<p>Each icon can also exist by itself, so if you only need for example the search and grid icon you can remove/comment out the code for the sort icon. See example below:</p>
	<p><img width="120" alt="screen shot 2016-02-05 at 1 53 39 pm" src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/2212/0000/9473/ee0d5a5a-cc0f-11e5-8cb7-d6e62c0fb24b.png"></p>
	<pre><code class="lang-html">&lt;div class=&quot;toolbar-icons&quot;&gt;
	
	  &lt;!-- Slide out search field --&gt;
	  &lt;div class=&quot;slide-out-search&quot;&gt;
	    &lt;input type=&quot;search&quot; class=&quot;search-field&quot; data-list-icons-search-field placeholder=&quot;Start typing to filter results..&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;/div&gt;
	
	  &lt;!-- Icon list --&gt;
	  &lt;ul class=&quot;toolbar-icons__icons&quot;&gt;
	    &lt;li data-list-icons-search-action-target=&quot;[data-list-icons-search-field]&quot; data-id=&quot;search-action&quot; class=&quot;icons__tool&quot;&gt;
	      &lt;svg class=&quot;tool-icon&quot;&gt;
	        &lt;use xlink:href=&quot;../../images/sprite.svg#common--search&quot;&gt;&lt;/use&gt;
	      &lt;/svg&gt;
	    &lt;/li&gt;
	    &lt;!-- Comment out a list item if it&#39;s not needed
	    &lt;li data-id=&quot;sort-action&quot; class=&quot;icons__tool&quot;&gt;
	      &lt;a href=&quot;#&quot;&gt;
	        &lt;svg class=&quot;tool-icon&quot;&gt;
	          &lt;use xlink:href=&quot;../../images/sprite.svg#common--arrows&quot;&gt;&lt;/use&gt;
	        &lt;/svg&gt;
	      &lt;/a&gt;
	    &lt;/li&gt;
	    --&gt;
	    &lt;li class=&quot;icons__tool&quot;&gt;
	      &lt;a href=&quot;#&quot;&gt;
	        &lt;svg class=&quot;tool-icon&quot;&gt;
	          &lt;use xlink:href=&quot;../../images/sprite.svg#common--grid&quot;&gt;&lt;/use&gt;
	        &lt;/svg&gt;
	      &lt;/a&gt;
	    &lt;/li&gt;
	  &lt;/ul&gt;
	
	&lt;/div&gt;
	</code></pre>
	<h4 id="testing-the-slide-out-search-field">Testing the slide out search field</h4>
	<p>In order to test the slide out search field on the overview page of <code>bluemix-components</code>, make sure you uncomment the first line of the class <code>toolbar-icons</code>:</p>
	<pre><code class="lang-css">.toolbar-icons {
	  // Uncomment the line below to test the slide-out search field
	  // margin-left: 25em;
	  display: flex;
	}
	</code></pre>

Alerts

<h1 id="alerts">Alerts</h1>

Card

Card Styles

Card (base)

  • Use this as a base card to build your own custom card

App

Container

Quota

Service

Virtual Server

Configuration

Change Status in Footer

When there's a card that shows status in its footer, toggle the active classname to show the appropriate status.

<!-- app status -->
	<div class="card-footer__app-status">
	  <div class="card-footer__app-status--running active">
	    Running
	  </div>
	  <div class="card-footer__app-status--not-running">
	    Not Running
	  </div>
	  <div class="card-footer__app-status--stopped">
	    Stopped
	  </div>
	  <div class="card-footer__app-status--limited">
	    Limited
	  </div>
	</div>
	
<h1 id="card">Card</h1>
	<h2 id="card-styles">Card Styles</h2>
	<h3 id="card-base-">Card (base)</h3>
	<ul>
		<li>Use this as a base card to build your own custom card</li>
	</ul>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0076/0000/7892/bc96f910-c43d-11e5-9a64-f9f12d8af4a9.png" alt="card"></p>
	<h3 id="app">App</h3>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0076/0000/7894/bc9a57a4-c43d-11e5-8c3b-6c9b7c4518d0.png" alt="app"></p>
	<h3 id="container">Container</h3>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0076/0000/7889/bc785d8e-c43d-11e5-8bb5-f4dd0b6d47ca.png" alt="container"></p>
	<h3 id="quota">Quota</h3>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0076/0000/7891/bc95bb90-c43d-11e5-9cd8-f5b3e2732a9e.png" alt="quota"></p>
	<h3 id="service">Service</h3>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0076/0000/7890/bc94a322-c43d-11e5-89af-6e82d4a2874b.png" alt="service"></p>
	<h3 id="virtual-server">Virtual Server</h3>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0076/0000/7893/bc97536a-c43d-11e5-9038-58fdb6740be3.png" alt="virtual-server"></p>
	<h2 id="configuration">Configuration</h2>
	<h3 id="change-status-in-footer">Change Status in Footer</h3>
	<p>When there&#39;s a card that shows status in its footer,
		<strong>toggle the <code>active</code> classname to show the appropriate status.</strong></p>
	<pre><code class="lang-markup">&lt;!-- app status --&gt;
	&lt;div class=&quot;card-footer__app-status&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;div class=&quot;card-footer__app-status--running active&quot;&gt;
	    Running
	  &lt;/div&gt;
	  &lt;div class=&quot;card-footer__app-status--not-running&quot;&gt;
	    Not Running
	  &lt;/div&gt;
	  &lt;div class=&quot;card-footer__app-status--stopped&quot;&gt;
	    Stopped
	  &lt;/div&gt;
	  &lt;div class=&quot;card-footer__app-status--limited&quot;&gt;
	    Limited
	  &lt;/div&gt;
	&lt;/div&gt;
	</code></pre>

Content Switcher

<h1 id="content-switcher">Content Switcher</h1>

Data Modules

Deprecated: Use modules instead.

Usage

Create modules within a module-section

<section class="data-section">
	  <div class="data-module--full">
	    <!-- ... -->
	  </div>
	</section>

Classes for base module containers:

  • data--one-third
  • data--two-third
  • data--half
  • data--full

Classes for internal modules (within the containing ones):

  • .full
  • .half

Required

@import 'bluemix-components/global/global';
	
	@import 'bluemix-components/components/data-module/data-module';
	
<h1 id="data-modules">Data Modules</h1>
	<h3 id="deprecated-use-modules-https-github-ibm-com-bluemix-bluemix-components-tree-master-components-modules-instead-">Deprecated: Use <a href="https://github.ibm.com/Bluemix/bluemix-components/tree/master/components/modules">modules</a> instead.</h3>
	<h3 id="usage">Usage</h3>
	<p>Create modules within a <code>module-section</code></p>
	<pre><code class="lang-html">&lt;section class=&quot;data-section&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;div class=&quot;data-module--full&quot;&gt;
	    &lt;!-- ... --&gt;
	  &lt;/div&gt;
	&lt;/section&gt;
	</code></pre>
	<p>Classes for base module containers:</p>
	<ul>
		<li><code>data--one-third</code></li>
		<li><code>data--two-third</code></li>
		<li><code>data--half</code></li>
		<li><code>data--full</code></li>
	</ul>
	<p>Classes for internal modules (within the containing ones):</p>
	<ul>
		<li><code>.full</code></li>
		<li><code>.half</code></li>
	</ul>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0078/0001/0513/1ec9a934-d19a-11e5-8896-c826996c75cf.png" alt="screen shot 2016-02-12 at 3 02 07 pm">
		<img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0078/0001/0514/21e4eb38-d19a-11e5-861c-f15185eed35d.png" alt="screen shot 2016-02-12 at 3 01 58 pm"></p>
	<h1 id="required">Required</h1>
	<pre><code class="lang-scss">@import &#39;bluemix-components/global/global&#39;;
	
	@import &#39;bluemix-components/components/data-module/data-module&#39;;
	</code></pre>

Detail Page Header

Dependencies:

// Path to bower_components
	// (edit according to your file structure)
	$path: 'bower_components/bluemix-components';
	
	// Global
	@import '#{path}/global/global';         // variables
	
	// Components
	@import '#{path}/components/tabs-nav/tabs-nav';
	@import '#{path}/components/detail-page-header/detail-page-header';

Variations

no-tabs

<header class="detail-page-header--no-tabs">
	  <a href="#" class="detail-page-header--no-tabs__link-wrapper">
	    <svg class="arrow">
	      <use xlink:href="https://dev-console.stage1.ng.bluemix.net/api/v4/img/sprite.svg#service--back"></use>
	    </svg>
	  </a>
	  <p class="info-title">Detail Page Header</p>
	</header>

With Tabs

<header class="detail-page-header--with-tabs">
	  <div class="detail-page-header--with-tabs__container">
	    <div class="detail-page-header--with-tabs__breadcrumb">
	      <a href="#" class="link-wrapper">
	        <svg class="arrow">
	          <use xlink:href="https://dev-console.stage1.ng.bluemix.net/api/v4/img/sprite.svg#service--back"></use>
	        </svg>
	        <p class="breadcrumb-title">breadcrumb title</p>
	      </a>
	    </div>
	    <div class="detail-page-header--with-tabs__info">
	      <p class="info-title">Detail Page Header</p>
	    </div>
	  </div>
	  <div class="detail-page-header--with-tabs__tabs-container">
	    <nav class="tabs">
	      <div class="tabs__trigger"><p class="trigger__text"></p>
	        <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
	        <svg version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px" viewBox="0 0 7.5 3.8" enable-background="new 0 0 7.5 3.8" xml:space="preserve">
	          <polygon points="0,0 7.5,0 3.8,3.8"/>
	        </svg>
	        </div>
	      <ul class="tabs__nav tabs--hidden">
	        <li class="nav__item selected"><a class="item__link" href="#">Overview</a></li>
	        <li class="nav__item"><a class="item__link" href="#">Containers Files</a></li>
	        <li class="nav__item"><a class="item__link" href="#">Connected Objects</a></li>
	        <li class="nav__item"><a class="item__link" href="#">Manage</a></li>
	      </ul>
	    </nav>
	  </div>
	</header>
	
<h1 id="detail-page-header">Detail Page Header</h1>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0076/0000/8659/20b8e8f8-c93f-11e5-8f9d-bcead0902eca.png" alt="detail-page-header"></p>
	<h2 id="dependencies-">Dependencies:</h2>
	<pre><code class="lang-scss">// Path to bower_components
	// (edit according to your file structure)
	$path: &#39;bower_components/bluemix-components&#39;;
	
	// Global
	@import &#39;#{path}/global/global&#39;;         // variables
	
	// Components
	@import &#39;#{path}/components/tabs-nav/tabs-nav&#39;;
	@import &#39;#{path}/components/detail-page-header/detail-page-header&#39;;
	</code></pre>
	<h2 id="variations">Variations</h2>
	<h3 id="no-tabs">no-tabs</h3>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0076/0000/8660/fd0f4662-c93f-11e5-89f8-421902330d21.png" alt="no-tabs"></p>
	<pre><code class="lang-html">&lt;header class=&quot;detail-page-header--no-tabs&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;a href=&quot;#&quot; class=&quot;detail-page-header--no-tabs__link-wrapper&quot;&gt;
	    &lt;svg class=&quot;arrow&quot;&gt;
	      &lt;use xlink:href=&quot;https://dev-console.stage1.ng.bluemix.net/api/v4/img/sprite.svg#service--back&quot;&gt;&lt;/use&gt;

	  &lt;/a&gt;
	  &lt;p class=&quot;info-title&quot;&gt;Detail Page Header&lt;/p&gt;
	&lt;/header&gt;
	</code></pre>
	<h3 id="with-tabs">With Tabs</h3>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0076/0000/8844/1f1fb48c-c9c0-11e5-909b-7ad7c9186249.png" alt="xs-small"></p>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0076/0000/8846/5aaf85ea-c9c0-11e5-86f5-2f30b1c92e65.png" alt="small"></p>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0076/0000/8845/5aaf890a-c9c0-11e5-8433-8880ec8d6bde.png" alt="tabs-expanded"></p>
	<pre><code class="lang-html">&lt;header class=&quot;detail-page-header--with-tabs&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;div class=&quot;detail-page-header--with-tabs__container&quot;&gt;

	        &lt;/svg&gt;
	        &lt;p class=&quot;breadcrumb-title&quot;&gt;breadcrumb title&lt;/p&gt;
	      &lt;/a&gt;
	    &lt;/div&gt;

	  &lt;/div&gt;

	      &lt;div class=&quot;tabs__trigger&quot;&gt;&lt;p class=&quot;trigger__text&quot;&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
	        &lt;?xml version=&quot;1.0&quot; encoding=&quot;utf-8&quot;?&gt;
	        &lt;svg version=&quot;1.1&quot; xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&quot; xmlns:xlink=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink&quot; x=&quot;0px&quot; y=&quot;0px&quot; viewBox=&quot;0 0 7.5 3.8&quot; enable-background=&quot;new 0 0 7.5 3.8&quot; xml:space=&quot;preserve&quot;&gt;
	          &lt;polygon points=&quot;0,0 7.5,0 3.8,3.8&quot;/&gt;
	        &lt;/svg&gt;
	        &lt;/div&gt;
	      &lt;ul class=&quot;tabs__nav tabs--hidden&quot;&gt;
	        &lt;li class=&quot;nav__item selected&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;item__link&quot; href=&quot;#&quot;&gt;Overview&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
	        &lt;li class=&quot;nav__item&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;item__link&quot; href=&quot;#&quot;&gt;Containers Files&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;

	  &lt;/div&gt;

Global Profile

<h1 id="global-profile">Global Profile</h1>

Header

This component represents the composed header template. The actual header inside Bluemix.Common will populate the template with actual content, but this is the base skeleton. Has taxonomy menu that lets user switch different feature areas.

Components required

@import 'bluemix-components/core/reset/reset';
	@import 'bluemix-components/core/colors/colors';
	@import 'bluemix-components/core/fonts/font-face';
	@import 'bluemix-components/core/typography/typography';
	@import 'bluemix-components/core/layout/grid';
	@import 'bluemix-components/core/layout/z-index';
	
	@import 'bluemix-components/components/taxonomy-item/taxonomy-item';
	
<h1 id="header">Header</h1>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0908/0000/7745/a423e5c8-c3f2-11e5-985c-d49edfa1621d.gif" alt="header"></p>
	<p>This component represents the composed header template. The actual header inside Bluemix.Common will populate the template with actual content, but this is the base skeleton. Has taxonomy menu that lets user switch different feature areas.</p>
	<h1 id="components-required">Components required</h1>
	<pre><code>@import &#39;bluemix-components/core/reset/reset&#39;;
	@import &#39;bluemix-components/core/colors/colors&#39;;
	@import &#39;bluemix-components/core/fonts/font-face&#39;;
	@import &#39;bluemix-components/core/typography/typography&#39;;
	@import &#39;bluemix-components/core/layout/grid&#39;;
	@import &#39;bluemix-components/core/layout/z-index&#39;;
	
	@import &#39;bluemix-components/components/taxonomy-item/taxonomy-item&#39;;
	</code></pre>

Modals

<h1 id="modals">Modals</h1>

Modules

Usage

Create modules within a module-section

<section class="module-section">
	  <div class="module--full">
	    <div class="module__body">Basic module</div>
	  </div>
	</section>

Classes for base module containers:

  • module--one-third
  • module--two-third
  • module--half
  • module--full

Classes for internal modules (within the containing ones):

  • .full
  • .half

Header and footer blocks are optional:

<div class="module--half">
	  <div class="module__header">Header</div>
	  <div class="module__body">Panel Body</div>
	  <div class="module__footer">Footer</div>
	</div>

Required

@import 'bluemix-components/global/global';
	
	@import 'bluemix-components/components/modules/modules';
	
<h1 id="modules">Modules</h1>
	<h3 id="usage">Usage</h3>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/1346/0000/8757/eeb59346-c999-11e5-93cc-8bc145bb0b09.png" alt="Module"></p>
	<p>Create modules within a <code>module-section</code></p>
	<pre><code class="lang-html">&lt;section class=&quot;module-section&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;div class=&quot;module--full&quot;&gt;
	    &lt;div class=&quot;module__body&quot;&gt;Basic module&lt;/div&gt;
	  &lt;/div&gt;
	&lt;/section&gt;
	</code></pre>
	<p>Classes for base module containers:</p>
	<ul>
		<li><code>module--one-third</code></li>
		<li><code>module--two-third</code></li>
		<li><code>module--half</code></li>
		<li><code>module--full</code></li>
	</ul>
	<p>Classes for internal modules (within the containing ones):</p>
	<ul>
		<li><code>.full</code></li>
		<li><code>.half</code></li>
	</ul>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0078/0001/0521/71f81f2a-d19d-11e5-8cfe-145d2c712a9c.png" alt="Module Options"></p>
	<p>Header and footer blocks are optional:</p>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/1346/0000/8756/9ca8d82e-c999-11e5-985f-f1d93a70bbd9.png" alt="With header and footer"></p>
	<pre><code class="lang-html">&lt;div class=&quot;module--half&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;div class=&quot;module__header&quot;&gt;Header&lt;/div&gt;
	  &lt;div class=&quot;module__body&quot;&gt;Panel Body&lt;/div&gt;
	  &lt;div class=&quot;module__footer&quot;&gt;Footer&lt;/div&gt;
	&lt;/div&gt;
	</code></pre>
	<h1 id="required">Required</h1>
	<pre><code class="lang-scss">@import &#39;bluemix-components/global/global&#39;;
	
	@import &#39;bluemix-components/components/modules/modules&#39;;
	</code></pre>

Overflow Menu

<h1 id="overflow-menu">Overflow Menu</h1>

Spinner

<h1 id="spinner">Spinner</h1>

Tabs Navigation

<h1 id="tabs-navigation">Tabs Navigation</h1>

Taxonomy Item

Taxonomy Item Styles

Global Dashboard

Create a global dashboard taxonomy item:

<a href="" class="taxonomy-item--global-dash is-empty">
	  <div class="taxonomy-item__icon">
	    <svg class="svg--taxonomy--compute-dims">
	      <use xlink:href="../../images/sprite.svg#taxonomy--compute"></use>
	    </svg>
	  </div>
	  <p class="taxonomy-item__metric"></p>
	  <p class="taxonomy-item__label">Compute</p>
	</a>

Taxonomy Item states

  • Empty state

To create the empty state, add the class is-empty.

  • Healthy state

To create the healthy state, add the class is-healthy.

  • Error state

To create the error state, add the class is-error.

  • Stopped state

To create the stopped state, add the class is-stopped.

Taxonomy Menu

Create a taxonomy menu item:

<a href="" class="taxonomy-item--taxonomy-menu">
	  <div class="taxonomy-item__icon">
	    <svg class="svg--taxonomy--compute-dims">
	      <use xlink:href="../../images/sprite.svg#taxonomy--compute"></use>
	    </svg>
	  </div>
	  <p class="taxonomy-item__label">Compute</p>
	</a>
	
<h1 id="taxonomy-item">Taxonomy Item</h1>
	<h2 id="taxonomy-item-styles">Taxonomy Item Styles</h2>
	<h3 id="global-dashboard">Global Dashboard</h3>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/2212/0000/8852/927dba40-c9c1-11e5-90f2-dbec9a4e8037.png" alt="Global Dashboard"></p>
	<p>Create a global dashboard taxonomy item:</p>
	<pre><code class="lang-html">&lt;a href=&quot;&quot; class=&quot;taxonomy-item--global-dash is-empty&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;div class=&quot;taxonomy-item__icon&quot;&gt;
	    &lt;svg class=&quot;svg--taxonomy--compute-dims&quot;&gt;
	      &lt;use xlink:href=&quot;../../images/sprite.svg#taxonomy--compute&quot;&gt;&lt;/use&gt;
	    &lt;/svg&gt;
	  &lt;/div&gt;
	  &lt;p class=&quot;taxonomy-item__metric&quot;&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
	  &lt;p class=&quot;taxonomy-item__label&quot;&gt;Compute&lt;/p&gt;
	&lt;/a&gt;
	</code></pre>
	<h4 id="taxonomy-item-states">Taxonomy Item states</h4>
	<ul>
		<li>Empty state</li>
	</ul>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/2212/0000/8853/cfeb859c-c9c1-11e5-9cff-f85fbe6e64c8.png" alt="Empty state"></p>

	<ul>
		<li>Healthy state</li>
	</ul>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/2212/0000/8868/554dadcc-c9c3-11e5-9503-39928e2a5dd7.png" alt="Healhty state"></p>
	<p>To create the healthy state, add the class <code>is-healthy</code>.</p>
	<ul>
		<li>Error state</li>
	</ul>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/2212/0000/8867/554ca206-c9c3-11e5-948e-807ce62aede0.png" alt="Error state"></p>
	<p>To create the error state, add the class <code>is-error</code>.</p>
	<ul>
		<li>Stopped state</li>
	</ul>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/2212/0000/8866/554c8208-c9c3-11e5-8ec7-4db9fc247789.png" alt="Stopped state"></p>
	<p>To create the stopped state, add the class <code>is-stopped</code>.</p>
	<h3 id="taxonomy-menu">Taxonomy Menu</h3>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/2212/0000/8871/b47e2088-c9c3-11e5-8b67-b47196b3eae9.png" alt="Taxonomy Menu"></p>
	<p>Create a taxonomy menu item:</p>
	<pre><code class="lang-html">&lt;a href=&quot;&quot; class=&quot;taxonomy-item--taxonomy-menu&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;div class=&quot;taxonomy-item__icon&quot;&gt;
	    &lt;svg class=&quot;svg--taxonomy--compute-dims&quot;&gt;
	      &lt;use xlink:href=&quot;../../images/sprite.svg#taxonomy--compute&quot;&gt;&lt;/use&gt;
	    &lt;/svg&gt;
	  &lt;/div&gt;
	  &lt;p class=&quot;taxonomy-item__label&quot;&gt;Compute&lt;/p&gt;
	&lt;/a&gt;
	</code></pre>

Toolbars

Toolbar style: Icons

After clicking the search icon

Configuration

Each icon can also exist by itself, so if you only need for example the search and grid icon you can remove/comment out the code for the sort icon. See example below:

<div class="toolbar-icons">
	
	  <!-- Slide out search field -->
	  <div class="slide-out-search">
	    <input type="search" class="search-field" data-list-icons-search-field placeholder="Start typing to filter results..">
	  </div>
	
	  <!-- Icon list -->
	  <ul class="toolbar-icons__icons">
	    <li data-list-icons-search-action-target="[data-list-icons-search-field]" data-id="search-action" class="icons__tool">
	      <svg class="tool-icon">
	        <use xlink:href="../../images/sprite.svg#common--search"></use>
	      </svg>
	    </li>
	    <!-- Comment out a list item if it's not needed
	    <li data-id="sort-action" class="icons__tool">
	      <a href="#">
	        <svg class="tool-icon">
	          <use xlink:href="../../images/sprite.svg#common--arrows"></use>
	        </svg>
	      </a>
	    </li>
	    -->
	    <li class="icons__tool">
	      <a href="#">
	        <svg class="tool-icon">
	          <use xlink:href="../../images/sprite.svg#common--grid"></use>
	        </svg>
	      </a>
	    </li>
	  </ul>
	
	</div>

Testing the slide out search field

In order to test the slide out search field on the overview page of bluemix-components, make sure you uncomment the first line of the class toolbar-icons:

.toolbar-icons {
	  // Uncomment the line below to test the slide-out search field
	  // margin-left: 25em;
	  display: flex;
	}
	
<h1 id="toolbars">Toolbars</h1>
	<h2 id="toolbar-style-icons">Toolbar style: Icons</h2>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/2212/0000/9454/c85087bc-cbfe-11e5-9136-f7f17976210c.png" alt="Toolbar: Icons"></p>
	<h4 id="after-clicking-the-search-icon">After clicking the search icon</h4>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/2212/0000/9477/a8901c8c-cc10-11e5-9807-3eb5cb107cba.gif" alt="toolbar-search-2"></p>
	<h3 id="configuration">Configuration</h3>
	<p>Each icon can also exist by itself, so if you only need for example the search and grid icon you can remove/comment out the code for the sort icon. See example below:</p>
	<p><img width="120" alt="screen shot 2016-02-05 at 1 53 39 pm" src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/2212/0000/9473/ee0d5a5a-cc0f-11e5-8cb7-d6e62c0fb24b.png"></p>
	<pre><code class="lang-html">&lt;div class=&quot;toolbar-icons&quot;&gt;
	
	  &lt;!-- Slide out search field --&gt;
	  &lt;div class=&quot;slide-out-search&quot;&gt;
	    &lt;input type=&quot;search&quot; class=&quot;search-field&quot; data-list-icons-search-field placeholder=&quot;Start typing to filter results..&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;/div&gt;
	
	  &lt;!-- Icon list --&gt;
	  &lt;ul class=&quot;toolbar-icons__icons&quot;&gt;
	    &lt;li data-list-icons-search-action-target=&quot;[data-list-icons-search-field]&quot; data-id=&quot;search-action&quot; class=&quot;icons__tool&quot;&gt;
	      &lt;svg class=&quot;tool-icon&quot;&gt;
	        &lt;use xlink:href=&quot;../../images/sprite.svg#common--search&quot;&gt;&lt;/use&gt;
	      &lt;/svg&gt;
	    &lt;/li&gt;
	    &lt;!-- Comment out a list item if it&#39;s not needed
	    &lt;li data-id=&quot;sort-action&quot; class=&quot;icons__tool&quot;&gt;
	      &lt;a href=&quot;#&quot;&gt;
	        &lt;svg class=&quot;tool-icon&quot;&gt;
	          &lt;use xlink:href=&quot;../../images/sprite.svg#common--arrows&quot;&gt;&lt;/use&gt;
	        &lt;/svg&gt;
	      &lt;/a&gt;
	    &lt;/li&gt;
	    --&gt;
	    &lt;li class=&quot;icons__tool&quot;&gt;
	      &lt;a href=&quot;#&quot;&gt;
	        &lt;svg class=&quot;tool-icon&quot;&gt;
	          &lt;use xlink:href=&quot;../../images/sprite.svg#common--grid&quot;&gt;&lt;/use&gt;
	        &lt;/svg&gt;
	      &lt;/a&gt;
	    &lt;/li&gt;
	  &lt;/ul&gt;
	
	&lt;/div&gt;
	</code></pre>
	<h4 id="testing-the-slide-out-search-field">Testing the slide out search field</h4>
	<p>In order to test the slide out search field on the overview page of <code>bluemix-components</code>, make sure you uncomment the first line of the class <code>toolbar-icons</code>:</p>
	<pre><code class="lang-css">.toolbar-icons {
	  // Uncomment the line below to test the slide-out search field
	  // margin-left: 25em;
	  display: flex;
	}
	</code></pre>
